      Classes in game that implement GamePlayer 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GameComputerPlayer
      An abstract computerized game player.
      class  GameHumanPlayer  
      class  ProxyPlayer
      A Player object that is a proxy for the real player, which is somewhere else on the network.

      Methods in game with parameters of type GamePlayer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected abstract boolean Game.canMove​(GamePlayer gp)
      Tells whether a given player is allowed to make a move at the present time.
      protected abstract boolean Game.canQuit​(GamePlayer gp)
      Tells whether a given player is allowed to quit the game at the present time.
      protected abstract GameState Game.getGameState​(GamePlayer p, int stateType)
      Gets information about the state of the game.
      GameState Game.getState​(GamePlayer p, int stateType)
      Gets information about the state of the game.
      protected int Game.indexOf​(GamePlayer p)
      Tells the numeric position of a player in the game
      protected abstract boolean Game.makeMove​(GamePlayer thePlayer, GameMoveAction move)
      Requests that a move be made on behalf of a player.
      java.lang.String Game.setPlayers​(GamePlayer[] players)
      Tells the game which players are playing.(Typically called by the GameDriver object after the players and game have been created.) Checks that the array consists of a set of players that can legally play the game (e.g., not too many or too few).
